function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Retrieving 536 media reports from the database Nexis could expose individuals to potentially contagious diseases if the database was accessed in a high-risk environment.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among individuals accessing the database.","Mitigation":"Ensure that individuals accessing the database follow proper hygiene and sanitation protocols to minimize the risk of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Access control systems, remote access technologies, and automated cleaning systems for the database environment.","People":"Individuals accessing the database, database administrators, and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Database administrators, facility management, and individuals accessing the database."},{"Description":"Analyzing 152 articles for policy measures could pose a risk of exposure to contagious diseases if the analysis is conducted in a high-risk environment.","Impact":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases among researchers conducting the analysis.","Mitigation":"Implement remote analysis capabilities, provide personal protective equipment (PPE), and enforce hygiene protocols during the analysis process.","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, video conferencing systems, and remote access to article databases.","People":"Researchers conducting the analysis, research assistants, and support staff.","Owner":"Research institution or organization, research team, and facility management."},{"Description":"Testing interrater reliability and refining criteria among researchers could increase the risk of disease transmission in case of close collaboration in a high-risk environment.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases among researchers during collaborative testing and refinement processes.","Mitigation":"Limit the number of researchers involved, enforce social distancing measures, and provide necessary protective equipment for in-person collaboration.","Technologies":"Collaboration software, virtual meeting platforms, and remote access to analysis tools.","People":"Researchers involved in testing and refinement, research assistants, and support staff.","Owner":"Research institution or organization, research team, and facility management."}]}
